WHAT THE CRAP IS THIS?!?! Megnet... really?  I have never used it before and dont know the benefit but its the new PB standard apparently.  It seems like a pain, I love 0-Day and have been downloading it for years but I dont want every file, I dont walk into a comic book store and buy every new issue of the week when all I want is the 5 or 6 I follow.  Anyway dont give up hope, its just a new way of doing business, see below from the PB Blog

http://thepiratebay.se/blog/208 says:
"you _can_ download individual files using magnets - just wait until the metadata is fetched from the network. It is worth it."

hey guis. just click the magnet link and wait for your comp to dl the torrent. then cancel the dl on utorrent ONLY USING REMOVE. then go to where your torrents dl (i just dl them to my desktop) and dbl click. you can choose what you want from there.
